title: I Love Cafe
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Organic, Western, Juice bar, Take-out, British, English, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Aug 2013 reported added meat and is no longer pure veg. Small, relaxed cafe located inside The Purple Lotus Health & Fitness center. Kitchen could make a dish to meet diet request. Offers soups, salads, artisan bread, vegan cake, flapjacks, brownies; drinks include teas, fair trade organic coffee, fresh vegetable and fruit juices, shakes and smoothies.
